value:
$WmMPID_双界リーフ,ch07_02_Leaf_MM_pair,Face|I am struggling to feel comfortable
in this festival outfit... What do
you think of it, Lord Seliph?$k$p$nMPID_セリス|I think it suits you well, Prince Leif.$k$p$nMPID_双界リーフ|You are too kind. You look very
gallant yourself, of course.$k$pI'm honored to have the opportunity
to fight at your side in the festival's
celebratory tournament.$k$p$nMPID_セリス|Indeed. I feel more at ease with you
at my back. I pray the friendship our
fathers shared will guide us as well.$k$p$nMPID_双界リーフ|I believe it will.$k$pIn the name of both our ancestors
and our fathers, we must do our best
to perform well in the tournament.$k$p$nMPID_セリス|Agreed. We must keep our focus
on that goal.$k$p

$WmMPID_聖祭ユリア,ch06_03_Yuria_F_Holy21,Face|Lord Seliph, Prince Leif... May I join
the two of you?$k$p$WmMPID_双界リーフ,ch07_02_Leaf_MM_pair,Face|Of course, Lady Julia.$k$p$nMPID_セリス|What timing. I was just thinking
to ask you myself.$k$pEven though this is a tournament
event, a fight is a fight, so it will be
dangerous. Stay close to me.$k$p$WmMPID_聖祭ユリア,ch06_03_Yuria_F_Holy21,Face|Of course...$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_聖祭ユリア,ch06_03_Yuria_F_Holy21,Face|Eeeyaaah!$k$p$WmMPID_セリス,ch07_02_Leaf_MM_pair,Face|Julia! Oh no, this is bad... We have
to retreat for now!$k$p$Sbs150|
